whySlotsIdol.getSupportInnerText: Casino representatives are available 24/7 via email and live chat. We assist with registrations, deposits, withdraws and everything about SlotsIdol Casino!

slotsIdolBlock.heading: SlotsIdol
slotsIdolBlock.firstPar: Our fun and friendly online casino is bursting with exciting games, unbeatable offers, giant jackpots – and you can explore them all on our user-friendly, mobile adaptive site.
slotsIdolBlock.secondPar: Fancy a flutter as well as a spin? Head over to our Sports tab to take advantage of competitive odds on all your favourite sports. From football and horse racing, golf and boxing, to Virtual Sports and everything in between.
slotsIdolBlock.thirdPar: We pride ourselves on producing the smoothest products, whether you prefer to play from your computer or on-the-go via mobile, tablet or app. No matter what device you use, you’ll find hundreds of incredible games at CasinoCasinoCasino.com.

theFunStuf.heading: The Fun Stuf
theFunStuf.firstPar: What’s more, we believe in rewarding our players. As a thank you for choosing us, our unrivalled Loyalty Points scheme pays you to play! Spend enough time with us, and you could also become a VIP, living the casino highlife.
theFunStuf.secondPar: The Serious StuffNow on to the serious stuff – our parent company, Mansion Group Ltd., winners of Best Customer Service Company 2020 and Online Casino Operator of the Year 2018 at the International Gaming Awards, is an online casino heavyweight. With over 15 years of industry experience, Mansion boast an impressive portfolio of brands.

If you have any questions, comments, or suggestions,

liveChat.heading: Live Chat

email.heading: Email
email.textInfo: For customer queries, write to us at support@slotsidol.com. For other questions or offers, drop us a line at info@vivarobet.am and we will make sure the right person receives your email. Or use docs@slotsidol.com when sending us your documents.

question1.question: What happens if my deposit is not showing?
question1.text: If your crypto deposit is now showing, this most likely means that it has not yet been confirmed in the blockchain, or that your wallet has not yet sent the funds, you can always check the blockchain to see if your transfer is visible there, or ask the support if you need a hand with this.

whyUseBitcoinBlock.heading: Why use Bitcoin?
whyUseBitcoinBlock.infoText: We know it can be a little tricky to wrap your head around the virtual currency of Bitcoin. We think it’s the way forward in online payments and we want you to know why, so let’s break it down.

security.heading: Security and control over your money
security.textInfo: The state-of-the-art encryption that secures your Bitcoin transactions is used in government and military transactions, so you know it’s the safest around. As long as you take the required steps to ensure your wallet is protected, no one can ever get their hands on your money.

international.heading: FAST INTERNATIONAL PAYMENTS
international.textInfo:
FAST INTERNATIONAL PAYMENTS 
The Bitcoin network is working tirelessly to make sure you’re never waiting on a transfer. You can pay someone on the other side of the world as quickly as you can pay your neighbour, with transfers from Africa to Canada only taking around 10 minutes. There’s no bank, with their snails-pace processes, to slow the whole procedure

fees.heading: ZERO OR LOW FEES
fees.textInfo:
ZERO OR LOW FEES 
Having to pay high transaction fees can be a real pain. The Bitcoin network is completely free, with an option to speed up transaction processes by paying a voluntary fee.

decentralized.heading: OPEN AND FULLY DECENTRALIZED
decentralized.textInfo: Unlike your bank and credit card accounts, Bitcoin isn’t owned by anyone. It’s open-source, with a community of developers maintaining the most popular clients. You’re free to spend and play without worrying about some shady banker dipping his fingers into your winnings.

identity.heading: IDENTITY PROTECTION
identity.textInfo: Criminals are clever and once they have your credit card information they can steal your identity and your money. That’s a thing of the past with Bitcoin. No case sensitive information is required and you can even send a payment without revealing your identity at all.

getStartedWithBlock.heading: Get Started With Bitcoins:
getStartedWithBlock.infoText: So now you know more about Bitcoins, we’re sure you’re wondering how to get started with them. Just follow these simple steps and get playing in no time. Here’s what you have to do.

textBlocks.blockOne: Firstly, you'll need to choose which wallet you want to use for your Bitcoin transactions. Just like real money, you'll need somewhere to keep them. Web wallets are the easiest most convenient to use. There are plenty of online wallet options out there, including .................., ................ or ................
textBlocks.blockTwo:
Once you’ve chosen your wallet, it’s time to actually purchase some Bitcoins. This process is getting easier and easier all the time, with lots of websites helping you to get your hands on the virtual currency.

Many sites let you exchange multiple currencies for Bitcoins. These include ..........., .............. and .............. You can even buy Bitcoins directly from other members in your community by finding them on sites like ...........................com.
textBlocks.blockThree: Once you have your Bitcoins it's time to get spending. You can use them to purchase just about anything, from homes to holidays, cars to coats and of course, our fantastic casino games too.

mainBlock.heading: Payments methods
mainBlock.textInfo: We are proud to be a safe multi-currency online casino. Currently, we accept the following currencies: Euro, US Dollars, Canadian Dollar, Australian Dollar, New Zealand Dollar, Japanese Yen, Renminbi, Polish Złoty, Russian Ruble, Norwegian Krone, Bitcoins, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Dogecoin, Tether and Litecoin.
